pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Pure Clove Bud 25ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

This oil energises and invigorates.

Also useful for: Mould inhibitor and natural cleaner

A powerful sweet-spicy aroma with a fresh-fruit undertone

Ingredients

Syzygium aromaticum 1mL/mL

Directions

Traditionally known for its antibacterial and mould inhibiting properties. Clove oil is an excellent natural cleaner and mould inhibitor. Simply add one teaspoon Clove Bud to 1L of warm water in a Spritz bottle. Spray bathroom surfaces, leave for 20 minutes, wipe off, re-spray and leave. STORE BELOW 30C. NOT TO BE TAKEN ORALLY. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.
